subject: Self Care
title: The Morning Routine
description: A quick win: understand The Morning Routine.

hook.text: Win the morning and the rest of the day follows. Lose it to scrolling and you're playing catch-up all day.

buildup.text: Morning routines work because willpower and cortisol are both highest upon waking. Use the peak wisely.

discovery.text: The most effective routines combine movement, intention-setting, and one proactive task before reacting.

twist.text: Copying someone else's routine rarely works. The best routine is one designed for your life and your goals.

climax.text: Start with three actions: hydrate, move, focus. Build from there. Simple routines survive real life.

punchline.text: Own your morning. The rest of the day follows.

quiz.question: Why are morning routines effective?
options: Willpower and cortisol are highest upon waking
They only work for early risers
